headline: The S&P 500 Is Too Exposed To Big Tech, Time To Buy JPMorgan’s Mid Cap Equity ETF Instead
summary: The S&P 500 (NYSE:SPY) has a concentration problem. Its top 10 holdings command 39% of the portfolio, with mega-cap tech names like NVIDIA (NASDAQ:NVDA), Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL), and Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) alone accounting for over 20%. Information Technology represents 34% of the fund, and when combined with Communication Services, Big Tech exposure pushes past 44%. For investors ... The S&P 500 Is Too Exposed To Big Tech, Time To Buy JPMorgan’s Mid Cap Equity ETF Instead

content.title: The S&P 500 Is Too Exposed To Big Tech, Time To Buy JPMorgan’s Mid Cap Equity ETF Instead
